attributes.additional_details: This e-petition is part of my Citizenship assessment, where I have to implement and evaluate a self-generated campaign.The government should enforce the restriction of exploitation against statutory rights involved with the Media. This is to avoid confidential stories from being leaked into the wider world.

rejection.details:
Please re-submit with a little more detail.

If it is about data protection of your Citizenship assessment, it is probably for Home Office to answer.
